amendment.description: Amendment reduces the Army Corps of Engineers Operation and Maintenance account by $4,900,000 and applies the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Army Corps of Engineers Operation and Maintenance account by $4,900,000 and increase the Spending Reduction account by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Woodall amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 191 (Roll no. 537).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Woodall amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 191 (Roll no. 537).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Woodall.
